workers.commandLine: python $rootdir/train.py $rootdir/$datadir -s src -t tgt --max-tokens 4000 -a $arch --share-all-embeddings --dropout 0.1668248780156888 --optimizer adam --adam-betas '(0.9, 0.98)' --clip-norm 0.08360349194582184 --weight-decay 4.128042415896815e-06 --lr 0.0007932866602343882 --lr-scheduler fixed --warmup-updates 51238 --min-lr 1e-09 --criterion label_smoothed_cross_entropy --label-smoothing 0.17925054063148077 --max-update 350000 --max-epoch 10 --save-dir $PHILLY_JOB_DIRECTORY
